metadata.title: Heidi & Oak Natural Labs - Vitamin C Anti-Aging Serum 20% - 1 Fl.Oz - 60 Day Supply - With Hyaluronic Acid + Vitamin E + Amino Acid Complex - Provides Nourishment, Restoration and Protection for Your Skin - Reduces Unsightly Wrinkles, Fades Age Spots, Calms Inflammation and Helps Combat Acne By Neutralizing Free Radicals for Beautiful Glowing Skin - Convienient Pump Action Bottle - Your Skin Will Love Our Vitamin C Serum - Made in USA
features: CLINICAL STRENGTH 20% Vitamin C: Our Powerful 20% Vitamin C Serum is highly effective while still being gentle on your skin and pores. We use only the finest plant based ingredients, with no parabens, alcohol, and no animal testing.

BETTER PUMP ACTION BOTTLE: Our easy to use pump action bottle prevents waste and extends the life of the serum ensuring 100% maximum potency. Most other Serums use a dropper bottle which causes the Vitamin C to oxidize and lose its effectiveness.

POWERFUL ANTI-AGING ADVANTAGES: Proven to dramatically increase collagen production and cellular turnover – resulting in a far smoother and even skin tone. Our unique formula utilizes powerful antioxidants – neutralizing free radicals to prevent and reverse sun damage and fade sun spots and discolouration.
PROUDLY MADE IN THE USA: Made in a state of the art FDA registered facility, our Vitamin C Serum is the absolute highest quality available on the market.
SATISFACTION GUARANTEED: We stand behind our products. Includes a 365-day hassle-free money back refund. If you are not 100% satisfied with the Serum we will gladly provide you with a full refund.
description: Take 10 years off of your face!

Rejuvenate your face with the potent antioxidant power of Vitamin C. Forget about expensive surgeries, lasers or chemical peels. Vitamin C is proven just as effective in reversing damage and slowing the signs of aging.   Our professionally formulated Vitamin C Serum will rejuvenate your skin, giving it that beautiful youthful glow.   Feel confident knowing the serum is penetrating deep in your skin and actively reversing the effects of aging.   Many users report feeling more radiant skin on the very first use!
Heidi & Oak Vitamin C Serum uses only the finest plant based ingredients, with no parabens, alcohol or animal testing.
Our Vitamin C Serum provides the following benefits:

Increases collagen production to revitalize skin elasticity.  Potent antioxidant properties which neutralize free radicals to reduce damage from sun, pollution and cigarette smoke.  Reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.  Protects skin from UV damage including sun spots, discolouration and wrinkles.  Increases the skin’s natural rate of exfoliation for a radiant, smooth complexion.  Additional Ingredients Vitamin E + Amino Complex + Hyaluronic Acid provide additional powerful anti-aging effects.   WORKS OR YOUR MONEY BACK Manufacturer's Guarantee: We back our products up with a 365-day hassle-free money back guarantee. If you are not completely satisfied, simply contact us and we will give you a full refund, no questions asked.
Don't wait another day to restore and protect your beautiful face! Order now while we are still in stock!
